title: “Coke’s not a food”: A critical discourse analysis of sugar-sweetened beverage tax acceptability by white residents from an upper-middle class neighborhood in Winnipeg Manitoba
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Anne Waugh, Patricia Thille, Kerstin Roger, Andrea Bombak, Kelsey Mann, Natalie Riediger
